title: Radha and Krishna (TEFC)
creator_credit: Jehangir Bhownagary and Documentary Films of India
brief_description: Among India’s legends one of the most poetic is the story of Radha and Krishna. Artists through the centuries have used this legend and the film brings to life the allegory in a series of miniature paintings.
creator_credit_for_label: Jehangir Bhownagary and Documentary Films of India
